website_summaries.verdict: This kit contains quality leather polishing products, but doesn't come with brushes and won't work for all leather colors.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the oil, wax, and salve that do a good job conditioning and polishing leather
Products also have a pleasant scent
Kit includes a soft polishing cloth
cons: Not ideal for lighter colored leather, as the wax is somewhat dark
Owners wish the kit included brushes, especially considering it's a bit pricey

customer_reviews.title: Will use on all my leather stuff now!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time user. Great results on 5 yr old worn boots. Best was the saddle soap. It took work buffing after the ‘salve’, but it was really worth it. Oil went on well, and ending with the wax was a plus. Only negative is the cheap cloth that came with it, it's breaking apart from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Motubila

customer_reviews.title: Otter Wax is the best and easiest leather care product line you'll ever find!!!
customer_reviews.text: This collection of boot care products fixed my favorite leather boots right up for the Montana winter conditions! I was amazed at how easy it was to use this kit, and yes, it comes with instructions! I've tried other products that are much more difficult to apply and maintain on my boots, but Otter Wax leather care products are the slickest thing you'll ever use on your boots, and the best! I've been wearing leather boots for many years, and wish I could've found Otter Wax products sooner!!! Get some!!! You'll love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great kit at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me my first pair of Ariat Western boots last year. I never wore them for fear of ruining the leather. Finally got them out and ordered the kit. Obviously I didn't need to clean them so I can't speak to the saddle soap however, I did use the conditioner and it worked well. It is slightly time consuming but well worth it. Only complaint I have is they darkened my boots slightly, it says they should return to their original color in a few days but it has been 5 days and they are still darker.
customer_reviews.author: Crissys2angels

customer_reviews.title: Love for my leather
customer_reviews.text: Very nice products. I've used each for a different item- Lems boots and shoes, wallet, and a belt. Great scent and texture to salve and oils. Also applies very evenly and spreads evenly as well. I used the saddle soap (never used saddle soap before) to clean up some marks on a pair of boots. It worked very well. Also, I'm very pleased the products are USA-made (and in the Northwest).
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Good products, cloth is not lint free
customer_reviews.text: The soap, conditioner, wax and oil works great!! The lint free cloth that comes with the kit is NOT lint free. I followed the I structuons and rinsed it and let it air dry before I used it but it didn’t matter. I used the cloth to apply the conditioner and lint was ALL OVER my boots. I ended up having to rewash them to get it off. I recommend the leather products but DO NOT use the “lint free cloth”
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my selection
customer_reviews.text: The contents within were as explained from the product description and presented very well from a customer perspective. The packaging is attractive and functional and I will use it to store the oils,, salves, and soaps to keep them organized. The package comes with one high quality cloth to get started right away. I have oiled and waxed my brief case and there was no change in the color and now simply has a new shine and soft pliable feel again. Very happy with my selection. One recommendation would be to include a brush with the kit as well so would truly be an "all in one" leather kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work well
customer_reviews.text: All items have a nice, mild smell. It is easy to use, and cleaned up my boots very nicely. My only warning, is that it significantly darkened my boots. I'm personally fine with how they came out, but if you love the original color of your leather, just be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyL

customer_reviews.title: Soap is very good. have not tried the boot wax
customer_reviews.text: Soap is very good. have not tried the boot wax. Oil is ok. I did not like the salve. soap takes the old waax in my shoes very good. However Salve, according to instructions, is suppose to act 30 minutes (gentleman's gazzette reccommends 24 hours). i am going to try it but on 30 mins, does not show a lot of hidratation results.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mcqueen

customer_reviews.title: The products smell great and work well
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this kit to clean and condition several pairs of shoes. The products smell great and work well. One pair of boots that I cleaned are probably ten years old and used hard and they look rejuvenated after using the Otter Wax products. After three pairs of shoes/boots, there is still a lot of product left in these smaller size tins, so there is plenty to care for shoes for quite awhile yet. I was very pleased to find a USA-made product with no petroleum in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara E.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good product. It brought my leather shoes back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good product. It brought my leather shoes back to life, making them very soft and supple. Use this once, leave them for a day, and you'll love your leather! The kit is more than just a cosmetic treatment. It's expensive. But it will last, and it's worth it. I recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit

customer_reviews.title: RUINED LEATHER!
customer_reviews.text: If you value your leather good, DO NOT use these products!! The saddle soap isn’t strong enough to clean anything! If you ever want to use your leather again do t use the Salve, it’s so think and IMPOSSIBLE to remove your leather is done for. You’ll never have a chance to try the oil after ruining your leather with steps 1 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: David Dziewit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have used this kit on 4 different pairs of boots since it was delivered and I couldn't be happier with the results. The included card that describes how to use each product is great. Breathed new life in to some very old dry and neglected boots that I'm proud to wear out again.
customer_reviews.author: FoCoLew81

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the oil.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the leather oil on my couch and based off a review who said they used a sock to apply it to their couch I did the same. And you can see all the streaks and I’m very worried I’ve damaged the leather of my new couch. It’s been a few days and you can still see the streaks, they didn’t absorb away. Update: eventually they did go away. I do prefer to use the salve over the oil though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will order again
customer_reviews.text: Great product, will order again. i have cleaned and treated two pairs of boots so far. The saddle soap is very mild and does a good job. The pastes are a bit hard at room temp but set the tins in the sun for ten minutes and they soften right up and are easy to apply. The oil did a great job on my work boots. They started a medium brown and the oil darkened them to a darker shade but that was expected. Water now beads off and scuffs are easily buffed off. The brushes are sturdy and only lost a few bristles from my aggressive scrubbing. Over all a great package.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. John

customer_reviews.title: Great for leather handbands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was recommended on the Magnolia website for the Joanna's favorite crossbody my husband purchased as a gift for me. So to keep it beautiful looking and to protect the leather I bought the product they said would be great. It is definitely GREAT. I just used it for the first time on the bag and it made the bag look brand new. So I HIGHLY recommend this product. And it is especially nice to know it is being made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Franceska Macsali

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! using it on my leather jacker, brief case, doc martin boots, and a pair of aldo boots. I'm basically finding anything I own that's leather and rejuvinating them. I wish I knew about this stuff decades ago! I've always been afraid to buy nice leather good , cause I was always afraid of how to take care of them. So many bad reviews on different product.. I've suggested this product to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ron NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great kit.
customer_reviews.text: Did a fair amount of research before giving this a try. The reviews were spot on, this is a great product. I was able to get my boots ready for the Michigan winter with the protection this product will provide. Easy to read instructions and came with everything needed to protect your leather.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not for
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. However, do not use the oil on your dress shoes. You will have a hard time to make your shoes shine again. Don’t make the same mistake as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This kit is full of awesome stuff. The Saddle soap cleans anything, smells awesome and washes away with ease. The leather salve worked into a more of a creamy texture and blended into the boots beautifully. The Leather oil added in some extra moisture and seems like it will be great way to add some quick moisture. The boot wax cured awesome overnight and really provided a good layer of protection on my new red wings. I would definitely recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: chris wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Used on my new Ariat work boots. Will use often on all my leather products (Chippewa boots, pancake holsters) My only recommendation is kit should come with cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Great products! I bought these to help bring some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great products! I bought these to help bring some life back to my old shoes and preserve my good shoes. It does a great job at protecting my shoes and restores them back to their natural condition. I will buy this for as long as they make it because I haven't found anything that even comes close. The videos on their website are very helpful as well. I always refer to them when I'm trying to remember which order to use the products in. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: WHETHER YOU ARE SHINING UP YOUR SHOES OR BELTS, THIS STUFF WORKS AND WORKS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Y Huffman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!...
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a cloth. The directions State to use a "lint free" cloth for applications. I now have a $300 pair of boots with white lint locked into the beeswax coating because these cheap bastards put a cheap cloth that is OBVIOUSLY NOT LINT FREE in the kit! Thanks for ruining my $300 boots cheap jerk-off's!...:/
customer_reviews.author: Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product nice sample of each step and and it looks like I’ll have enough to get about 5 to 6 cleanings and protection out of it.
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the opportunity to use the Leather Salve and it worked great. Treated a pair of boots, took a quick walk in the rain yesterday and the water beaded up on the leather like rain on a freshly waxed car. I will be using the other products shortly as I need to clean up some other leather.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: This is one of his favorite products, and specifically requests it for Christmas and ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for my brother for the second year in a row- he loves this stuff and uses it regularly. This is one of his favorite products, and specifically requests it for Christmas and birthdays. Keeps his work boots and play boots looing spiffy. Would absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Seay

customer_reviews.title: Solid product with minor improvements to be made
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used only once but appears very solid. My only three requests would be to add the brushes in the kit, you can't buy them in Amazon otherwise, add a manual in the box for first timers with the whole process from cleaning to the wax step; and make the oil more "shiny" right after application it looks fantastic but as it dries up it gets matter that what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend OtterWax. Their products are keeping my Eastlands in shape and my feet dry in the winter. I also appreciate that their products are made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Completely renewed my leather!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks. I used it to clean and condition a pair of Clark's Desert Boots that looked like they had been through a war. After treatment they look brand new. I'll be using it to take care of my leather goods going forward.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought this kit for me for Christmas one year and I’ve been hooked ever since. Nothing cleans, restores, and protects my Red Wings boots better. All natural products too!!! Other shoe waxes and cleansers are laced with carcinogens - not so with Otter Wax products!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with results
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was my fault but I think I expected more out of it. Might be user error. I’m back to more simple and cheaper products they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: mostafa aly

customer_reviews.title: Great, Natural products!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the kit to revitalize a leather purse. Used all four steps and it looked brand new! I hadn't realized how dried out the leather had gotten until I saw it after all of the otter wax products. I've used the boot wax in the past, and thought it was great, so I would highly recommend the Otter Wax products.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works! I polished three pairs of shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I polished three pairs of shoes (2 pairs for work and 1 pair of boots I wear more casually) and each time I wore the newly polished shoes people asked me if they were new! The polish cleans up the shoes well and gives them an authentic shine. Will continue to use this stuff for as long as I'm around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel that it leaves a little opaque shoes,
customer_reviews.text: I feel that it leaves a little opaque shoes, I do not know if it can be worn on any shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otterwax is my new favorite shoe care brand
customer_reviews.text: I'm a shoe freak! I love all my shoes and I try, to the best of my ability, to take excellent care of them . I've used a lot of different waxes, cleaners, and oils on my lovely leather shoes, but Otterwax is by far my favorite shoe care kit to date! Otterwax keeps my shoes looking new without the strong chemical scent and feel that many other shoe care products have. I definitely recommend Otterwax to anyone who is searching for the perfect way to keep shoes fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Brought a pair of boat shoes back to life and ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought a pair of boat shoes back to life and waterproofed my hiking boots. This stuff does what its supposed to. It darkened the leather a little but nothing extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product originally showed up with 2 salves and no wax. But, otter wax sent a whole new kit with everything fixed. Everything included in the kit works great. Just know that this product will make your leather a bit darker though.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. Used all these products in recovering come brown leather dress shoes and it came out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: vee

customer_reviews.title: Every thing you need in one kit.
customer_reviews.text: This product has all you need to care for leather goods and has easy to follow instructions. I used it on leather boots and it helps keep them hydrated and water resistant. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Better than Saphir
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product, period. I've been loyal to Saphir for years, but after using this kit for couple months, I'm not going back. Good job Otter wax!
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy amd complete bundle
customer_reviews.text: The most complete kit I needed to keep my boots in tip top shape!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the saddle soap so far, but I am definitely happy with the results. These products should definitely keep my boots in good shape for life.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I really like the packaging also
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Otter Wax Leather Car Kit for my son for Christmas and he loves it. Made an old pair of leather boots look new again. I would definitely order this product again. I really like the packaging also!!
customer_reviews.author: R Heim

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff!!! Both my boots look brand new. My only complaint is that I have no excuse now to wifey to buy new boots!!! Hahahaha!!! Keep up the Good work!!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good purchase! My leather shoes look better than when they were bought. Absolutely love that there are no fumes with these products.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good company, good product
customer_reviews.text: Having used their fabric wax for several years, I decided to give their leather care kit a try. Everything works well, and the saddle soap doesn't smell like grandma's dime store perfume. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and glad to support a small commercial effort ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and glad to support a small commercial effort that is sorely needed in our world 🌎 .
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Makes my boots so soft and supple.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my boots so soft and supple. Makes my fiancé 4 year old boots used for wildland firefighting look only a year or two old
customer_reviews.author: jennifer stegall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Product came well organized, and I was able to use it without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it does darken the leather. Rather you not use this on your expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: Somsai

customer_reviews.title: Restores your boots
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great. It restored my 8 year old boots back to the original color and shine
customer_reviews.author: Side Door

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received the otter wax very fast in the mail. All of the products made my Danner boots look great. The only thing that I wish would be included we detailed steps in which order to use each product. Also the box that it comes in is ok but it would be nice if it had a bag to keep all of the items together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. As someone that loves boots and all forms ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. As someone that loves boots and all forms I've tried a number of products. I have everything from leather work boots, to docs and cowboy boots. This kit is my all in one stop kit to care for, clean and protect my favorite shoes. Definitely plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything you need for your leather goods...I use it on all of my leather motorcycle gear...
customer_reviews.author: tambourinemonkey66

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kit works great would be nice if it included the applicator and polisher brush
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great results. Will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Rock_Chalk

customer_reviews.title: The leather feels soft and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit on my Duluth boots and Wow! The leather feels soft and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Lush Leather Care
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful products to show some love to your old leather boots.
customer_reviews.author: Boulder gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great products, great smell, easy and pleasant to use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pengirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It cleans well the flannel rag sucks it leaves a bunch of white fuzz on your shoes
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: supple texture that felt like a good protector for future wear
customer_reviews.text: Used the leather salve to bring water-damaged leather back to life. The dryness was replaced by a waxy, supple texture that felt like a good protector for future wear. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products, no petroleum. Made in Portland. My lems 9to5 leather shoes look great!
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA M MCDERMOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great product. If something needs a protective coat
customer_reviews.text: Great product . If something needs a protective coat...This brand is my "Go-To"!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After using the full kit my boots look better than the first day i bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: products seem of higher quality than what I use on my hair and skin haha.
customer_reviews.author: reid

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Saved a pair of old boots, deepened the color and shine on a new pair. I'm a convert, totally worth it. Smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lauters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in one package. Delivery was in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nice branding, but horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It is super high quality in the product itself and the branding of the packaging is nice. However, the way the company packaged it makes it difficult to reuse the box because the front tab is glued. I wish the company would design a better box that could be reused or include a nicer box so I can keep all of the products together. Opening it was difficult and with the price I paid for this product, I expected a higher quality container. I highly recommend Otter Wax but make sure you have a spare box to store your care kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Restores boots
customer_reviews.text: I've traditionally used Neatsfoot oil for my work boots. After further research I decided to try this kit out since it included most of the products you need, (minus a scrubbing brush and horsehair brush). I think the products are great, my boots look a lot better. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because the saddle soap is extremely hard and I'm not sure how you're supposed to make it "lather" when it's like wax. I'm not experienced with saddle soap, so it would be nice if instructions were included to help with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $40 holler for this
customer_reviews.text: Too little for too much. Really a $40 holler for this... urghhh
customer_reviews.author: H2O

customer_reviews.title: Direction on how to use the product would have been nice.
customer_reviews.text: hard to use a product that gives very incomplete directions. Your not even given what order to use the products, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C. Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with products but in need of more instructions
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the kit and the fact that the products are made in America, from natural ingredients. My only request is that the kit include more detailed instructions about order and application. I eventually found some instructions on the Otter Wax website but again, this could somehow be communicated in the kit. Also, I had the impression that the leather salve was quite brittle and it did not work itself into a foam (even with an increasingly damp cloth / brush). Otherwise, my leather came out looking and feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Rose

customer_reviews.title: I recommend watching the videos on Otter Wax website
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to care for my leather cowboy boots. I live in the mountains and am outside in my boots most of the time. I got the kit because I had boots that needed extra care after a year of steadty outdoor use, and new boots that I wanted to prep for the winter. I recommend watching the videos on Otter Wax website. They are short and demonstrate how to use the product for optimal results. My boots that went through last winter were reconditioned and the new boots prepped for winter. I'm deffinately buying again in order to maintain boot quality In all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Terese Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Ugg boots I recently had cleaned after buying them on eBay. The leather was very dry. I applied the Leather Salve twice within 24 hrs. After 48 hrs I applied the Boot Wax and kept them warm using a PEET dryer for 10 hrs. The Uggs now look and feel like new. First pic is untreated and treated for comparison. Second pic is the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: detailed instructions/pictures are presented that are easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The products, if applied carefully worked very well. My only complaint is that they do not give clear instructions for each product. However, if you visit their website, detailed instructions/pictures are presented that are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my imported leather booties all winter long and never had any problems. :) If you are new to having real genuine leather products to care for with truly natural products just read the instructions they include with the products. I will be a repeat customer when I need to replenish my supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it runs out quickly. Literally washed 2 leather jackets and it’s already almost out. A pain in the butt to use but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Sultan M

customer_reviews.title: Good sampling of all the products
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item because it gave me a sampling of each of the products. However, I only used 2, the leather salve and leather oil on my new sofa. The tins are smaller than I thought, but the leather salve did an entire full-sized sofa with 3 seat cushions, 3 back cushions and 2 side pillows plus frame...and I have a little less than half the tin left over. The oil is my favorite though! Sofa looks awesome and it doesn’t leave a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this set of products
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders on my severely scuffed up cowgirl boots. I highly recommend this set of products.
customer_reviews.author: Homestead maker

customer_reviews.title: If you have genuine leather, you want to take care of it.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I last had real leather goods that I wanted to take care of, but I came across the kit and it works well, from what I see.
customer_reviews.author: the_kcar

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product. Does make my boots shine
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Does make my boots shine. It comes in a cardboard box that quickly becomes coated in shoe oil and polish, so you need to transfer everything to a better container. Again, just small thing.
customer_reviews.author: LongShoreLondon

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes / boots
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Works well. Relatively small sizes of each product or I would have given 5 stars. Made my boots look new and car seats nice and rich.
customer_reviews.author: S G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This leather care kit works great on my boots! I have used it a few times and my boots look shiny and new!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah C Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Could be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Awesome supplies, main reason it’s 4 stars is because some parts (towel) had been missing. Make my boots look dark nothing unexpected though. Also after testing water beading was definitely visible.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Renner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This kit functions as two important things, 1 as a quality leather care for leather boots, it polishes nicely, the oils are fantastic, overall a great kit to have to fix and extend the life of your boots. 2 it makes a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: abel sosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with Awesome results!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful products and easy to use. If you have questions on how to apply products, there website helps with answers. Very happy I found you guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cooper

customer_reviews.title: ... my home state of Maine and I needed a good cleaning kit and this did more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Eastland boots that are made in my home state of Maine and I needed a good cleaning kit and this did more than I expected!

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. This product is recommended by Schott so I ...

customer_reviews.title: I use these on my leather purse and love it. Whenever I do
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my leather purse and love it. Whenever I do, it always seems like a new purse. The only think I'd change is many have more cloths come in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great leather care kit!  Very impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for cleaning and restoring leather shoes. I wish I would have bought this sooner and used it to keep my favorite Patagonia loafers from early damage. It does a great job remoistening the leather and smells great when applying. Very easy to use and works great. Large enough sizes to use on many pairs of shoes or boots.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Has nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried the salve from this kit so far, but I like it. Has a nice smell and seems to moisturize the leather nicely. I was using Dr. Martens wonder balsam, but this product smells far and away nicer - and it works basically the same. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johns

customer_reviews.text: Cant wait to clean and condition all my leather items. Tote, shoes, belts, and wallets!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to apply. I used the oil and boot wax to protect 2 leather hand bags. Apply oil to cloth before applying to the leather or it may leave a darker spot on the leather where it was squirt on. Great product and will continue to use to maintain leather items.

product_meta.title: Otter Wax Leather Care Kit
product_meta.description: Get all 4-Steps to our leather care system in this sampler bag! When it comes to caring for your old, dehydrated leather, it’s always important to Clean, Condition, Shine, and Protect. This custom kit contains the four items you’ll need to ensure that your leather stays supple, healthy, and water resistant. A little bit more about our 4-Step approach to caring for leather. Use our Saddle Soap to gently clean your leather and remove stains. Follow with our Leather Salve to moisturize your leather as it restores oils, revives suppleness, and repairs cracking from dehydration. Our Leather Oil is a quick way to revive the natural shine of your leather with a deep-conditioning combination of flaxseed oil, vitamin-e, and our proprietary blend of all-natural essential oils. Finally, use our Boot Wax for an added layer of protection and water repellency. COMES WITH ONE OF EACH: SADDLE SOAP (Reg. 2oz Tin) LEATHER SALVE (Reg. 2oz Tin) LEATHER OIL (Reg. 5oz Bottle) BOOT WAX (Reg. 2oz Tin), FLANNEL BUFFING CLOTH
feature_bullets: Saddle Soap to Clean // Leather Salve to Condition
Leather Oil to Shine // Boot Wax to Protect
Made by hand in Portland, Oregon
